hero.description: I design and build modern, high-performance applications.

description.0: I am a highly motivated computer science student, always ready to take on new challenges and learn new things. I've worked on quite a few different projects, which has helped me develop both my technical skills and my ability to work effectively in a team, even under pressure.
description.1: I love everything related to web and software development, and I'm constantly exploring new technologies to stay up to date. I also enjoy sharing my knowledge with others so we can grow together.
description.2: I'm currently in my third year of the Grande École Program at Epitech. I'm always looking for opportunities to put what I learn into practice and to contribute to exciting projects.
